module.name: part_and_version_identification
module.purpose: The Part and version identification application module supports the requirement to identify and version parts.

inscope.li: the identification of a version of a part;

definition.def: A part is an item that is intended to be produced or employed in a production process.
A crude or processed material that can be converted by manufacture, processing, or combination with other raw materials and products into a new and useful product or raw material.

uof.name: Part_And_Version_Identification
uof.description: The Part_And_Version_Identification UoF specifies the data structure for the representation of the identification of a part and a part version.

usage_guide.p: This clause describes usages of the concepts defined in this module.
This module can represent the identification information for a part.

example.p: A product, which is a detail part, is identified '28650001' and named 'Rear Panel'. It has been identified by the organization NATO. The part has a version identified '--A'
